p: These results were further confirmed by the extrapolation of IC 50 values. In particular, Vo-STB showed the lowest IC 50 value of 240.6 µg/mL at 72 h, followed by Vo-in vivo with an IC 50 value of 275.1 µg/mL at 72 h. Vo-C and Vo-S showed IC 50 values of 454.7 µg/mL and 419.9 µg/mL after 72 h of treatment, respectively.
